investors.description: Extracts a list of all investors, including subscribers (Teckningsåtagare) and guarantors (Garantiåtagande), using a detailed, multi-level extraction logic.
investors.semantic_search_query: Section or table listing investor names, subscription commitments (teckningsåtaganden or teckningsförbindelser), and guarantee commitments (garantiåtaganden or garanti)

record_date.description: Extracts the record date ('Avstämningsdag') for determining shareholder rights.
